document.full_text: two swedes have been jailed for life in the philippines for violating human trafficking laws by running a live internet porn operation in a southern city that catered to foreigners.
document.title: two swedes jailed for life for philippine internet porn
lines_and_colors: two swedes have been jailed for life in the philippines for violating human trafficking laws by running a live internet porn operation in a southern city that catered to foreigners.
